attributes.action: Free meal for all emergency nhs and key workers at work during COVID-19 crisis
attributes.additional_details: That is in humanistic to keep them hungry during work , please provide them free food at work who are risking for others during this crisis
attributes.background: During emergency crisis situation,  many staffs are not able to make their foods to bring at work. Sometimes due to shortage of time and some times due to shortage of food.

rejection.details:
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303485

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

The Government has also created an online service to help you out what you can do if you’re struggling because of coronavirus: https://www.gov.uk/find-coronavirus-support 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
